licence_overview: To practise as a chiropractor, you need to register with the [General Chiropractic Council.](http://www.gcc-uk.org/page.cfm "General Chiropractic Council"){:rel="external"}

overview: You need to register as a chiropractor with the General Chiropractic Council
title: Register as a chiropractor
